to go to a concert.

I had simpler tastes as a younger kid.  I was enthusiastic and content with the littlest things, like trips to McDonald's after Sunday Mass followed by walks on the beach and window shopping at the mall.  I guess that comes with growing up poor but I'm thankful for it because these days I'm a minimalist and can still appreciate the beauty in the small things.

I've felt excited two days ago about moving to my new house.

I am so happy.  I met the nicest guy on Live Chat.
